page.title: 04LIDLINGTON_PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: GOVERNMENT LEGISLATION. LOCAL GOVERNMENTACT 1972 CONTROLS PARISH COUNCILS. LIDLINGTON REQUIREMENT IS 9 SEATS, ELIGIBILITY_MUST LIVE WITHIN 3 MILES OF PARISH BOUNDARY. CHAIRMAN ELECTED BY COUNCILLORS. PARISH COUNCIL EMPLOYS A CLERK TO MINUTE AND ADMINISTER MEETINGS AND BUSINESS. PARISH COUNCIL RESPONSIBILITIES I.E. LIGHTS_GARDENS_PONDS RECREATION FIELDS ETC.PARISH COUNCILS PRECEPT ON DISTRICT COUNCIL MONEY NECESSARY 1985 Â£4560.DISTRICT COUNCIL CONVERTS THIS TO 4 PENNY RATE FROM RATEPAYERS. PARISH COUNCIL APPOINTS LOWER SCHOOL GOVERNERS. PARISH COUNCIL COMMENTS ON ALL PLANNING APPLICATIONS TO DISTRICT COUNCIL PLANNING AUTHORITY.
